script_lines.speaker: Narrator
script_lines.text: In the year 2157, aboard the starship Aurora, Captain Zara receives an urgent transmission.

script_lines.speaker: captain_zara
script_lines.text: Marcus, what's the status on that signal?

script_lines.speaker: engineer_marcus
script_lines.text: Captain, it's coming from an unknown sector. The signal is encrypted, but I'm working on it.

script_lines.speaker: ai_nexus
script_lines.text: Analysis complete. The transmission originates from coordinates previously marked as uninhabited.

script_lines.speaker: captain_zara
script_lines.text: Uninhabited? That's impossible. Set a course for those coordinates, maximum warp.

script_lines.speaker: Narrator
script_lines.text: As the Aurora speeds through the void, an alien vessel suddenly appears on the viewscreen.

script_lines.speaker: alien_commander
script_lines.text: Human vessel, this is Commander Vex of the Zephyr Collective. We have been waiting for you.

script_lines.speaker: captain_zara
script_lines.text: Waiting for us? How is that possible?

script_lines.speaker: alien_commander
script_lines.text: Time works differently for our species. We have seen your arrival in the threads of possibility.

script_lines.speaker: Narrator
script_lines.text: And so begins an adventure that will change the course of human history forever.
